syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
    "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Catppuccin Mocha",
    "workbench.iconTheme": "catppuccin-mocha",
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "workbench.startupEditor": "terminal",
    "explorer.compactFolders": false,
    "explorer.fileNesting.enabled": true,
    "catppuccin.accentColor": "maroon",
    "workbench.tree.indent": 16,
    "git.ignoreLimitWarning": true,
    "cSpell.userWords": [
        "addlist",
        "Catppuccin",
        "cbonsai",
        "chatlist",
        "dotfiles",
        "Firstname",
        "grammyjs",
        "hyprctl",
        "hyprland",
        "INWORK",
        "Lastname",
        "pacman",
        "playerctl",
        "playerlabel",
        "pulseaudio",
        "scandir",
        "TDATA",
        "Vladyslav",
        "waybar",
        "wttrbar"
    ],
    "terminal.external.linuxExec": "kitty",
    "editor.fontFamily": "'Droid Sans Mono', 'monospace', 'JetBrainsMono Nerd Font Mono'",
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "cSpell.language": "en,uk,ru",
    "[shellscript]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "foxundermoon.shell-format"
    },
    "terminal.integrated.confirmOnKill": false,
    "code-runner.showRunCommandInExplorerContextMenu": false,
    "window.menuBarVisibility": "toggle"
}"}
